Title: How I Live Now
Genre: Action, Drama, Romance, Sci-Fi, Thriller, War
Writer: Meg Rosoff (based on the novel by), Jeremy Brock (screenplay by), Penelope Skinner (screenplay by), Tony Grisoni (screenplay by), Jack Thorne (additional material)
Actors: Saoirse Ronan, Tom Holland, George MacKay, Harley Bird
Plot: An American girl, sent to the English countryside to stay with relatives, finds love and purpose while fighting for her survival as war envelops the world around her.
